Stem: Wide spreading. Contain a milky sap.
Leaves: Lance-shaped, 5-15 cm long, arranged alternately along stems. Glossy green upper surface, paler underneath.
Flowers: Funnel-shaped yellow or peach-orange 5-7 cm long. With a strong sweet smell.
FruitSeeds: Oval, egg, or triangular-shaped, up to 3 cm diameter. Fleshy green when young, ripening to black, enclosing a stone with 2 kernels.
